adrs/001-mcp-server-architecture.title: ADR-001: MCP Server Architecture using TypeScript SDK

adrs/006-mcp-tools-api-design.title: ADR-006: MCP Tools API Design and Interface Specification

adrs/007-mcp-prompts-and-resources-integ.title: ADR-007: MCP Prompts and Resources Integration

adrs/README.title: Architectural Decision Records
adrs/README.description: This directory contains the Architectural Decision Records for the DocuMCP project - an intelligent MCP server for GitHub Pages documentation deployment.

explanation/architecture.title: DocuMCP Architecture Overview
explanation/architecture.description: This document explains the architectural design of DocuMCP, providing insight into how the system works and why key design decisions were made.

how-to/github-pages-deployment.title: How to Deploy to GitHub Pages
how-to/github-pages-deployment.description: This guide shows you how to deploy your documentation to GitHub Pages using DocuMCP's automated workflows.

how-to/local-testing.title: Local Documentation Testing
how-to/local-testing.description: This guide shows how to test your documentation locally before deploying to GitHub Pages using containerized environments that don't affect your system.

how-to/prompting-guide.title: How to Prompt DocuMCP Effectively
how-to/prompting-guide.description: This guide shows you how to interact with DocuMCP using effective prompts to get the best results from the system.

how-to/repository-analysis.title: How to Analyze Your Repository with DocuMCP
how-to/repository-analysis.description: This guide walks you through using DocuMCP's repository analysis capabilities to understand your project's documentation needs.

how-to/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
how-to/troubleshooting.description: This guide helps you diagnose and fix common problems when using DocuMCP for documentation deployment.

index.title: DocuMCP Documentation
index.description: Welcome to DocuMCP - an intelligent Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for GitHub Pages documentation deployment. This comprehensive guide is organized following the Diataxis framework.

reference/cli.title: Command Line Interface
reference/cli.description: DocuMCP primarily operates as an MCP server integrated with AI assistants, but it also provides command-line utilities for direct usage and debugging.

reference/configuration.title: Configuration Options
reference/configuration.description: This reference guide covers all configuration options available in DocuMCP and the static site generators it supports.

reference/mcp-tools.title: MCP Tools API Reference
reference/mcp-tools.description: DocuMCP provides a comprehensive set of tools via the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools enable intelligent documentation deployment through repository analysis, SSG recommendations, and automated GitHub Pages setup.

reference/prompt-templates.title: Prompt Templates
reference/prompt-templates.description: DocuMCP provides a comprehensive set of prompt templates to help you interact effectively with the system. These templates are designed to get optimal results from DocuMCP's AI-powered documentation tools.

research/domain-5-github-deployment/gith.title: GitHub Pages Deployment Security and Limitations Analysis

research/README.title: DocuMCP Research Documentation
research/README.description: This directory contains comprehensive research planning and findings for the DocuMCP project implementation phase.

tutorials/development-setup.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
tutorials/development-setup.description: This tutorial covers setting up a development environment for ongoing documentation work with DocuMCP, including local testing, content workflows, and maintenance automation.

tutorials/first-deployment.title: Your First Documentation Deployment
tutorials/first-deployment.description: This tutorial walks you through deploying your first documentation site using DocuMCP, from analysis to live GitHub Pages deployment.

tutorials/getting-started.title: Getting Started with DocuMCP
tutorials/getting-started.description: This tutorial will guide you through setting up and using DocuMCP's intelligent documentation deployment system with memory-enhanced capabilities.
